title: What happens to an account if you quit?
body:
After nearly 4 years, I've uninstalled and quit the game. 

I'm just curious as to what happens with these accounts, since it won't be played on as selling or giving the account away is against ToS?

Do they just sit there, gathering virtual dust, and clogging up Riot's database?

Do Riot delete inactive accounts after a year, or something?

I'm curious.

replies.body: I've done the same. The suspensions are just taking the piss and loot boxes to farm those most committed to the game are a turkey slap in the face. The game has gone to pizzle since q3 2017 (calendar year not financial year). Bummer that usernames expire. I assume the account is still recoverable though?

other people can take the username (unless riot locks it) after just a few months of inactivity, and yes the account just sits and gathers dust. There are some 'dead' accounts from beta still stored in the database, though I do think some things are deleted like custom item builds and maybe friends list after a few years.

I don't believe item builds are server side anymore, assuming they aren't they'd be deleted when you delete the game. Friends lists should remain intact, but if you're inactive for along time a lot of people would probs clean you out of their list.

The time before the username is 'freed' goes up with account level. A level 1 only has like a month (if that) but it's either 3 or 6 for level 30 accounts I believe.

Lol do you havr proof on this? Or are you speculating?

I can't remember where but there was a riot post about this a while back, try using the boards search feature. The item builds and friends list is speculation, but riot does keep accounts from beta, and they should still theoretically be accessible with the right passwords.

For anyone who might find this on Google. Accounts and information related to your accounts as of writing this are never deleted. You're name will be available after 6-30 months depending on your level. Levels 1-6 = 6 months, levels 7-30 = 7-30 months and levels over 30 = 30. If someone does take your name you'll be given a free name change when you next log in. I made https://lolnames.gg/en/ and I've had confirmation from a Riot employee about this.

Oh, i guess we'll all leave sooner or later, i think if i end up getting banned for a stupid reason again i'll probably do the same :(, riot have a year to fix it otherwise

I'm gonna miss running into all my boards people, its a shame riot have run it into the ground, this was a really good game :(
